scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n "User,Admin,Owner" -c "blue,green,yellow" "cd User && npm run dev" "cd Admin && npm run dev" "cd Owner && npm run dev"
scripts.build:all: npm run build --prefix User && npm run build --prefix Admin && npm run build --prefix Owner
scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix User && npm install --prefix Admin && npm install --prefix Owner
